{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=Lyra |revision=Mini (MAP-AC1300) |asin=B076GLQ1BT;GB; |price=380 |series=AC1300 |est_release_date=04/30/2017 |fcc_date=06/12/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Pegatron |manuf_model=HiveDot |manuf_rev=1.01 (B1) |availability=now |type=wireless router, wireless system, mesh node, |fcc_id=MSQ-RTACBV00 |ic_id=3568A-RTACBV00 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4018 |cpu1_cspeed=710 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q256CFIG |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8072 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz WLAN Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY2623L;;2; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;2; ,,, Bluetooth 4.0 + HS Chip;Atheros;AR3012-BL3D;;1; ,,, 9-Channel LED Lighting Driver;Texas Instruments;LP5523;;1; |flags=Wave2, 256QAM, MU-MIMO, Bluetooth 4.0, LED, |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;3.14; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=HIVEDOT_XX_2G,HIVEDOT_XX_5G |default_ssid_regex=^HIVEDOT_[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}_2G$,,,^HIVEDOT_[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}_5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=34:97:F6 |oui_eth=34:97:F6 }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''400''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''1300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1300 Whole-Home Wi-Fi System}} :Seamless Wi-Fi Signal in Every Corner of Home :{{ProductPage|https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra-Mini}} (Kit 3x) {{SupportPage|vendor=ASUS|model=Lyra-Mini}} "HIVE_DOT REV:1.01" and "1645" is silkscreened on the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3422239 board]. :This device is a Lyra Mini including 2.4GHz 802.11b/g/n (2x2), BT 4.0 :and 5GHz 802.11an/ac (2x2) transmitting and receiving function. "F/W ver.: 3.0.0.4_380_6597, H/W ver.: B1" is silkscreened on the sticker. {{see also|ASUS MAP-AC1300|Pegatron}} *[http://www.apkmirror.com/apk/asustek-computer-inc/asus-lyra/ ''ASUS Lyra app'' on '''APKMirror'''] :Compatibility Models: :- [[ASUS Lyra]] (MAP-AC2200) :- [[ASUS Lyra Mini]] (MAP-AC1300) :- [[ASUS Lyra Trio]] (MAP-AC1750) :- [[ASUS Lyra Voice]] (AC2200) ===Overview=== *'''Banish Wi-Fi Dead Spots''' – The tri-node system delivers perfect :Wi-Fi coverage to every corner of your home. *'''Smooth Connections, Always''' – As you move around your home, :you’ll always be automatically connected to the best possible signal. *'''Commercial-grade Security''' - AiProtection blocks security threats :to protect all devices on your home network. *'''You’re in Control''' – ''ASUS Lyra app'' allows no-fuss setup, lets manage :bandwidth and informs you instantly about any technical problems. *'''Family Overview''' – The feature lets you easily view and control each :family members’ internet and app usage from your mobile device. ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Qualcomm]] [https://www.qualcomm.com/products/ipq4018 IPQ4018] @717MHz Quad Core Processor *Wireless Standard: 802.11bgn (2.4GHz), 802.11an/ac (5GHz) *Wireless Speed: 400Mbps for 2.4GHz, 867Mbps for 5GHz *Wireless Security: WPA/WPA2, WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK *Features: Wave2, MU-MIMO, Guest Wi-Fi, WPS, WMM :Adaptive QoS, AiProtection, Parental Control, IPv6 *Antenna: 3x internal antennas *Ports: 1x WAN GbE, 1x LAN GbE *Operation Mode: Router, Access point *Dimensions: (132mm Dia x 33mm H) :132mm x 132mm x 33mm (LxWxH) (without bezel) *Weight: 450 grams (15.87 ounces)/station *Power: DC 5V/2A adapter ===Reviews=== *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/asus-lyra-mini-review ''ASUS Lyra Mini review'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] *[https://www.redeszone.net/asus/lyra-mini-map-ac1300/ ''Asus Lira Mini (MAP-AC1300)'' on '''RedesZone'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://forums.hardwarezone.com.sg/107730138-post7.html On '''HardwareZone''' forums] (Maylyn's post) *[http://wl500g.info/entry.php?10135-ASUS-Blue-Cave-amp-Lyra On '''wl500g.info''' forums] (Omega's blog) ===GPL Info=== {{SCollapse|GPL info >> • |
###########################################################################
# Qualcomm Atheros little-endian ARM platform, linux-3.14.x
# SOC: IPQ401x
# Valild option for BOOT_FLASH_TYPE are shown below:
#	SPI, NAND

export MAP-AC1300 := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y SSH=y QCA=y IPQ40XX=y PARENTAL2=y YANDEXDNS=y  
 VPNC=y EMAIL=y OPENVPN=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y EBTABLES=y AUTODICT=y BUILD_NAME="MAP-AC1300" 
 NVRAM_64K=y TUNEK="n" OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y ODMPID=y BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=SPI MDNS=y FINDASUS=y 
 TEMPROOTFS=y DEBUGFS=y CFGSYNC=y USB="USB" XHCI=y NOTIFICATION_CENTER=y WLCEVENTD=y 
 REDIRECT_DNAME=y \
	UBI=y UBIFS=y WPSMULTIBAND=y \
	LP5523=y BT_CONN=y DETWAN=y SINGLE_SSID=y SSID_AMAPS=y \
	ATF=y QCA_TW_AUTO_BAND4=y STAINFO=y JFFS2USERICON=y HIVE_LIB=y HIVE_BIN=y \
	NATNL_AIHOME=y WIFICLONE=y QCA_VAP_LOCALMAC=y BWDPI=y PSISTLOG=y LYRA_HIDE=y 
        DUAL_BACKHAUL=n ETHBACKHAUL=y MASTER_DET=y
}} ===See also=== :[[List of Wireless Systems]] *[[ASUS Blue Cave]] - ''AC2600 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Blue-Cave/ PPage] :128MB Flash, 512MB RAM, [[Intel]] Wi-Fi, IFTTT, IoT • [https://www.engadget.com/2017/05/29/asus-blue-cave-wireless-router/ Computex 2017] *[[ASUS Lyra]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (2T2R 802.11abgn/ac) + QCA9886 (2T2R 5GHz) :*[[ASUS HiveSpot]] - ''AC2200 Multi-Point Wi-Fi System'' • CES 2017 *[[ASUS Lyra Mini]] - ''AC1300 Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra-Mini/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 @717MHz Quad Core (2T2R 802.11abgn/ac) :*[[ASUS HiveDot]] - ''AC1300 Multi-Point Wi-Fi System'' • CES 2017 *[[ASUS Lyra Trio]] - ''AC1750 Dual Band Mesh Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33179-asus-expands-lyra-mesh-family CES 2018] *[[ASUS Lyra Voice]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Mesh Router with Smart Speaker'' __NOTOC__
